response.summary:
Bilingual Master in Computer Science, Mechatronics Engineer with emphasis on embedded systems and machine vision, with knowledge in design and implementation of Machine Learning systems, with excellent communication skills and interaction with people.
Experience in design of products and automated systems and control applied in manufacturing processes, flexible systems of manufacturing and robotics.
response.skills: Node.js, Leadership, Research, Embedded Systems, Machine Learning, CAD/CAM, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Project Management, Project Engineering, Sales, Automation, Process Automation, AutoCAD, LaTeX, C++, C, Python, Customer Service, Management, Public Speaking

profile_positions.description:
Collaborate with stakeholders, including Product Managers and Clients, to align technical decisions with the requirements' goals and timelines.
Assign and track user stories to the development team to ensure no blockers are on our way and we can advance in our backlog as expected.
Provide technical guidance to make decisions to ensure a proper requirements fulfillment whilst assessing and mitigating software risks (security, scalability, maintainability, etc.)
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead

profile_positions.description:
Requirements definition for deployment to High Security Area production servers. Organized synchronization of developments.

Production ready continuous deployment.
profile_positions.title: PreProduction Engineer

profile_positions.description:

Quality analysis of the translations and transcriptions made by other team members, providing its corresponding feedback.

profile_positions.description:
I created Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition (SCADA) systems along with Human Machine Interfaces (HMI) according to customer requirements.
I performed the programming of Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) in order to integrate monitoring and control modules in real-time through field bus protocols.
profile_positions.title: Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:

Provide academic advisory to the students.
profile_positions.title: Auxiliary Student

profile_positions.description:

Research about new technologies applied in the improvement of the food supply-chains.
Obtain and verify the Bill of Materials (BoMs) for the obtainment and purchase of the needed peripherals.

profile_positions.description:

Orientation in the management of employee data concerning access and assistance, including but not limited to vacations and work exceptions due to situations of force majeure.
Management of installation projects, renovation and maintenance of access control and assistance systems.
profile_positions.title: Independent Consultant and Capacitor of Access Control and Assistance Systems

company.name: Instaleap
company.description:
We are a SaaS Platform built from scratch to power high performing on-demand operations for supermarkets. Our technology has been built out of real world operational experience of running a leading on-demand 1-hour delivery operation across 3 countries with millions of deliveries. The platform is now serving dozens of leading supermarket chains across LATAM, US and Europe to achieve last-mile excellence. We help our clients deliver world class last mile experiences through proprietary AI-based algorithms and apps that manage the clients last-mile ecosystem.
 
Our Start-up DNA and mindset keeps us fast and flexible while delivering outstanding service through our team of experienced professionals.
